summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Board of Adjustment (Panel C) will convene on June 17, 2024, for a briefing at 10:00 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium, with options for videoconference participation.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The meeting will include a staff presentation, public hearing, and public testimony. Key agenda items consist of the approval of minutes from the May 20, 2024 meeting and discussions regarding various case dockets.

**Important Details**:  
The agenda features several uncontested cases, primarily focused on requests for special exceptions related to fence height and standards at various locations, including 4337 Park Lane and 5404 Falls Road. Additionally, there is a holdover case concerning visibility obstruction regulations at 10802 Strait Lane.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is seeking approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will deliberate on the uncontested items, which include multiple applications for special exceptions. Interested parties wishing to speak must register by June 16, 2024. The meeting will also address potential executive session topics, including legal advice and property negotiations, if necessary.
